ABOUT

Classic Turkish Towels is America's #1 Turkish towel manufacturer. Since 1996 we've been supplying hotels, spas, casinos and more with our premium line of 100% Turkish cotton towels. Our manufacturing facility, Makroteks, has been Turkey's leading textile company for over 20 years, and is ISO9001 & OEKO-TEX certified.

    Barnum Turkish Cotton Large Bath Towels - 3 Pieces
    MRS. BARNETT (Jacksonville, US)
    Loving the Barnum Turkish Cotton Large Bath Towels

    I bought 3 of the Barnum Turkish Cotton Large Bath Towels in the color coffee. I am very impressed with the quality. Frankly, I am surprised that the Barnum Turkish towels are superior to the 800 GSM bath towels that I bought from Pottery Barn which are thick, but rough and not fluffy. The Barnum Turkish bath towels are more soft and fluffy with a 700 GSM. Most online research says that the higher GSM means a better quality towel. In my opinion, that is not true.

    I have laundered my towels three times and they still feel soft. I do not use fabric softener in my clothes anymore because they will eventually ruin fabrics. I use homemade softener (vinegar and essential oils) in the softener dispenser.

    Overall, I'm very glad that I bought the Barnum towels and this one will be my 1st choice for all replacement towels in my home. Thank you for producing quality products. Please do not change!
